io.github.teamfractal.actors

Class AdjustableActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.WidgetGroup
          • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table
            • io.github.teamfractal.actors.AdjustableActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class AdjustableActor
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table
    A UI widget that works similarly to spinbox that allows users to enter a numerical value using their mouse to click buttons to increase and decrease said value

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdjustableActor

        public AdjustableActor(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String action,
                       boolean labelAndButton)
        The adjustable actor For an easy way of adjust values in a step of 1 / -1.
        Parameters:
        skin - The skin file for the UI.
        title - The adjustable title.
        action - The action button text.
        labelAndButton - specifies whether or not the user wishes to have the title label and action button displayed on screen
